v.1.0.11

7 fix query car year by checkbox elements
8 fix checked if one element select
9 add function getCarFuelTypeByModel
10 add function exteriorColorByMark
11 add function getEngineByModel
12 update function ..byModel
13 update function getIDByTerm
14 add field Drivetrain
15 add to REST API drivetrain [ 'type' => 'string', 'required' => false ]
16 add to REST API features [ 'type' => 'string', 'required' => false ] separator "|"
17 add function getMakeByPostID
18 add function getModelByPostID
19 Added gradation of interest and loan term depending on the year of car production
20 fix update dealer info
